ðŸ“– Summary: The w3af repository provides a web application attack and audit framework, functioning as an open-source web vulnerability scanner. It helps developers and penetration testers identify and exploit vulnerabilities such as Cross-Site Scripting, SQL injection, and OS commanding in their web applications, with the capability to detect over 200 different types of vulnerabilities.
